title: Any item can't be selected at first in the library outline view
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected when first attempting to do so in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected.
EB: After the initial attempt, the item can be selected.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a label to a library file. 2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
